function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Different effects of methods on different types of buildings could lead to inconsistent control of disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in certain types of buildings","Mitigation":"Standardize methods and protocols for disease prevention across different types of buildings","Technologies":"Building management systems with automated disease prevention measures","People":"Occupants of different types of buildings","Owner":"Building management and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Positive effect of methods in all types of buildings may lead to a false sense of security","Impact":"Neglect of other disease prevention measures due to over-reliance on tested methods","Mitigation":"Provide comprehensive training on disease prevention and emphasize the importance of multi-faceted approaches","Technologies":"Simulation software for testing various disease prevention scenarios","People":"Occupants, building managers, and public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities and building management"},{"Description":"Varying effects of methods in different risk buildings may result in inadequate disease prevention in high-risk buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in high-risk buildings","Mitigation":"Implement specialized disease prevention measures for high-risk buildings","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems and UV disinfection technology","People":"Occupants and visitors of high-risk buildings","Owner":"Building management and public health authorities"}]}
